before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"8iamu","text":"Ensure a lab coat, lab goggles, and plastic gloves are worn throughout this assay.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}
description: {"blocks":[{"key":"6kfl0","text":"This protocol measures the absorbance of urea in solution in complexation with diacetyl monoxime at 520 nm and is linearly proportional to concentration up to 5 mM urea.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bh8jv","text":"Mix until dissolved. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ao5u8","text":"Add    diacetyl monoxime (99% purity) and   thiosemicarbazide (99% purity) to a 250 mL volumetric flask.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":42,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"b5781","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"20.9","error":false,"guid":"92098C70874311EBA0F7D95A72AA7362","id":"86384","label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":5}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"52.4","error":false,"guid":"AA2F7E90874311EBA0F7D95A72AA7362","id":"86385","label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":5}}}}

","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":18,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"4cp06","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"250","error":false,"guid":"CC779640874311EBA0F7D95A72AA7362","id":"86386","label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"c87me","text":"Mix until dissolved. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"53nhb","text":"Prepare known concentrations of urea at 0, 1, 2, 3, 4, and 5 mM for a calibration curve.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ebi5p","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dn2oe","text":"Fill a 600 mL beaker with   deionized water.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":26,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"80q11","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"200","error":false,"guid":"4BD390307D1A11EBACE0FBE91B9E026D","id":"86387","label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6ef29","text":"Place the 600 mL beaker on hot plate and bring to a boil.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"f8mai","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6u0v1","text":"To test a sample, aliquot   into a 20 mL glass test tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":26,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"6d7th","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"EAFA4ED0806F11EB950E6DFC38AA3D55","id":"86388","label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c9l1s","text":"Add   Mixed Color Reagent. {"blocks":[{"key":"30gb0","text":"Ensure contents of test tube are vigorously mixed by vortexing for at least   .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":76,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"bojer","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":5,"guid":"A7FC6580F13C11EB8D936FFFB919F712","id":"78427","label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"croj4","text":"Repeat steps 12-15 for each sample and standard to be analyzed.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"8c8p6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5kbm8","text":"Ensure test tubes are labeled and place in boiling water bath for   .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":66,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"f5h9d","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":1200,"guid":"241DAA40874111EBA0F7D95A72AA7362","id":"78428","label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b5djv","text":"Remove tubes from water bath and let cool for   .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":46,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"b4br6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"E9310DD0F13C11EB8D936FFFB919F712","id":"78429","label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"8qqib","text":"Fill plastic cuvette to line with cooled solution. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"946rb","text":"Place sample cuvette in spectrophotometer and record absorbance at 520 nm. Blank against the standard solution with both reagents, but no urea.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6ev37","text":"Use the calibration curve to determine urea concentrations of unknown solutions.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}
